paper_abstract: In this paper we will look at the relationship between the intersection number c (2) and the diameter of a distance-regular graph. We also give some tools to show that a distance-regular graph with large c (2) is bipartite, and a tool to show that if k (D) is too small then the distance-regular graph has to be antipodal.
paper_title: A relationship between the diameter and the intersection number c (2) for a distance-regular graph
